hero.title: Find Your Dream 3BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 55 Gurugram Ready to Move Luxury
description: Discover unparalleled comfort and modern living with our curated listings of 3BHK flats for sale in Sector 55 Gurugram. This established residential sector on the Golf Course Extension Road offers a perfect blend of peaceful community life and seamless connectivity to major business hubs and entertainment zones. Whether you are a growing family or a professional seeking spacious, well-appointed homes, Sector 55 provides exceptional value and long-term appreciation potential.

Browse verified properties, including luxurious builder floors and high-rise apartments, all featuring superior construction quality, ample natural light, and premium fixtures. Sector 55 is renowned for its excellent social infrastructure, including top schools, hospitals, and high-street markets, ensuring every convenience is just minutes away. Start your journey today and secure a sophisticated 3BHK flat that matches your lifestyle and investment goals in one of Gurugram's most sought-after locations.

featuresSection.heading: Premium Features Defining 3BHK Residential Excellence in Sector 55 Gurugram
description: The availability of 3BHK flats for sale in Sector 55 represents the pinnacle of urban residential design tailored for modern Indian families. These homes are designed to maximize space utility while providing high-end amenities that enhance the quality of life. From modular kitchens and sprawling balconies to secure gated communities, the focus is squarely on comfort, safety, and prestige.

Explore the defining features that make these 3BHK properties a highly desirable investment. We focus on properties that ensure optimal light, ventilation, and structural integrity, guaranteeing a hassle-free transition into your new home in Sector 55 Gurugram.

features.title: Spacious Layouts
features.description: Our listed 3BHK flats typically feature super areas ranging from 1500 sq ft to over 2200 sq ft, ensuring ample space for living, dining, and utility areas. Enjoy intelligently designed floor plans that separate private and public zones effectively, making them ideal for joint families or those who frequently entertain guests.

features.title: Modern Modular Kitchens
features.description: Every premium 3BHK property comes equipped with contemporary modular kitchens fitted with high-quality hardware and ample storage solutions. These spaces are designed for efficiency and style, often featuring dedicated utility balconies and provisions for modern appliances like dishwashers and built-in ovens.

features.title: Superior Connectivity
features.description: Sector 55 boasts excellent road connectivity, situated right near the Golf Course Extension Road and the Gurgaon-Faridabad Road. Residents enjoy easy access to the Rapid Metro station, major NH-48, and the upcoming infrastructure projects, significantly reducing commute times to Cyber Hub and Golf Course Road offices.

features.title: Robust Security Measures
features.description: Safety is paramount. Most 3BHK residential complexes in Sector 55 are gated communities featuring multi-tier security systems, including 24x7 surveillance, trained security personnel, controlled access points, and video door phones, providing peace of mind for all residents.

features.title: Premium Internal Specifications
features.description: Expect high-end finishes like imported marble flooring in living areas, engineered wooden flooring in bedrooms, branded sanitary ware, and VRV/VRF air conditioning systems in select units. These specifications guarantee a luxury living experience immediately upon moving in.

features.title: Exclusive Amenities Access
features.description: Residents gain access to world-class amenities like exclusive clubhouses, temperature-controlled swimming pools, fully equipped gymnasiums, sports courts, and dedicated children's play areas. These facilities foster a holistic and active community lifestyle right within the premises of your 3BHK complex.

whyChoose.title: The Strategic Advantages of Buying a 3BHK Flat in Sector 55 Gurugram
description: Choosing a 3BHK flat in Sector 55 is more than just purchasing property; it is investing in a superior lifestyle and assured appreciation. This sector consistently ranks high among Gurugram's desirable residential areas due to its balanced urban planning and proximity to critical civic and economic infrastructure.

Our focus is to connect you with properties that offer unmatched quality, strategic location benefits, and excellent long-term rental or resale potential. See why Sector 55 stands out in the competitive Gurugram real estate landscape.

points.title: Prime Location on Golf Course Road Extension
points.description: Sector 55 provides unparalleled access to both the established corporate hubs on Golf Course Road and the newer commercial centers along the Extension Road. This central location dramatically cuts down commute times, offering residents more time to enjoy their luxurious 3BHK homes and local amenities, a significant advantage in Gurugram.

points.title: Robust Social Infrastructure and Amenities
points.description: The sector is fully developed with excellent infrastructure. You are minutes away from leading international schools like Scottish High International and top-rated medical facilities. High-street retail outlets, fine dining establishments, and everyday convenience stores are plentiful, ensuring all lifestyle needs are met within a small radius.

points.title: Assured High Rental Yield Potential
points.description: Given its strategic location close to major commercial areas and IT parks, 3BHK flats in Sector 55 command strong rental demand. This makes purchasing a property here an excellent investment for those seeking passive income, consistently yielding higher returns than many neighboring sectors.

points.description: Sector 55 offers a diverse inventory of 3BHK options. Buyers can choose between immediate possession in ready-to-move builder floors or luxury apartments, or invest in promising new residential projects currently under development, catering to different budgetary needs and timelines.

points.title: Excellent Metro and Road Network Accessibility
points.description: The rapid metro stations connecting to key areas of Gurugram are easily accessible from Sector 55, providing a reliable mode of transport. Furthermore, direct road connections to Faridabad and Gurgaon via the expressway ensure seamless regional travel, enhancing the sector’s connectivity quotient.

points.title: High Quality of Construction and Maintenance
points.description: Properties listed in Sector 55 generally adhere to stringent quality standards, often featuring renowned developers. The maintenance of residential complexes is typically high, ensuring pristine communal areas and reliable utility services, protecting the long-term value of your 3BHK investment.

points.title: Family-Friendly and Secure Environment
points.description: The sector is known for its peaceful, organized residential pockets, offering a safe environment ideal for raising children. Numerous parks, open spaces, and well-managed societies contribute to a community atmosphere that is both inclusive and secure.

points.title: Investment in a Premium Address
points.description: Owning a 3BHK Flat in Sector 55 Gurugram means acquiring a prestigious address. This area is associated with premium living and high appreciation rates, ensuring that your property remains a valuable asset in the rapidly expanding National Capital Region NCR real estate market.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions about 3BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 55 Gurugram
faqSection.description: Get detailed answers to common inquiries regarding property options, pricing, and infrastructure in Sector 55 Gurugram.

faqs.question: What is the typical price range for a 3BHK flat in Sector 55 Gurugram
faqs.answer: The pricing for a 3BHK flat in Sector 55 can vary significantly based on the type of property, size, specific project, and luxury amenities. For premium builder floors and apartments, prices generally start from INR 1.5 Crore and can go upwards of INR 3 Crore for ultra-luxury projects. Factors influencing the final price include the floor level, whether it is ready to move, and the age of the construction. It is highly recommended to consult with our property experts for the most current and accurate market rates tailored to your specific requirements.

faqs.question: Is Sector 55 considered a good area for family living and long-term investment
faqs.answer: Absolutely Sector 55 is highly regarded for both family living and investment purposes. For families, the presence of top-tier schools, reputable hospitals, and safe, well-maintained residential societies offers a high quality of life. From an investment perspective, its location near major corporate hubs like Golf Course Road and excellent connectivity assures consistent capital appreciation and strong rental returns, making it one of Gurugram's most reliable residential markets.

faqs.question: Are 3BHK builder floors or high-rise apartments more popular in Sector 55
faqs.answer: Both options are highly popular, catering to different buyer preferences. Builder floors in Sector 55 are favored by those seeking independent living, greater space, terrace or basement rights, and lower maintenance costs associated with high-rise societies. Conversely, high-rise apartments attract buyers looking for comprehensive amenities like clubhouses, extensive security, centralized management, and organized community living. Your choice depends on whether you prioritize privacy and space or extensive facilities and security.

faqs.question: What is the connectivity like from Sector 55 to key commercial areas in Gurugram
faqs.answer: Connectivity is one of Sector 55’s strongest assets. It offers direct and swift access to the corporate offices along Golf Course Road and Cyber Hub via rapid transit and well-maintained roads. The sector also links efficiently to Sohna Road and the Southern Peripheral Road SPR, making it easy to reach various parts of Gurugram. The nearby Rapid Metro station further enhances its accessibility, reducing dependency on road transport during peak hours.

faqs.question: What kind of amenities can I expect in a modern 3BHK society in Sector 55
faqs.answer: Modern 3BHK societies in Sector 55 typically offer a comprehensive range of luxury amenities. These usually include fully equipped gymnasiums, large clubhouses, swimming pools, dedicated children's play areas, multi-purpose halls, and sports facilities such as tennis or basketball courts. Additionally, expect 24x7 power backup, integrated security systems, ample parking, and professional property management services to ensure smooth daily living.

faqs.question: Are there any ready to move 3BHK options available in Sector 55
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 55 has a substantial inventory of ready to move 3BHK flats, particularly in established builder floor enclaves and older, well-maintained high-rise societies. Ready-to-move options allow buyers to bypass construction delays and start generating rental income or move in immediately. We specialize in verified ready-to-move listings to ensure a smooth and immediate transition for our clients.

faqs.question: What are the common plot sizes and configurations for 3BHK builder floors here
faqs.answer: For builder floors offering 3BHK configurations, the underlying plot sizes commonly range from 150 square yards to 300 square yards. These plots accommodate spacious 3BHK units, often including a servant room or utility room. The layout usually ensures maximum use of natural light and ventilation, and many units come with exclusive lift access and dedicated parking slots, offering a luxury villa-like feel within an apartment setup.

faqs.question: What is the status of infrastructure development around Sector 55
faqs.answer: Sector 55 is a mature sector, meaning most core infrastructure like roads, water supply, and electricity is already robust and well-established. Future developments primarily focus on enhancements such as better internal sector roads and improved public transport integration. The continued development of the Golf Course Extension Road corridor ensures that connectivity and civic amenities only get better, solidifying its appeal.

faqs.question: Can I get home loan assistance for purchasing a property in Sector 55
faqs.answer: Yes, properties listed in Sector 55, particularly in established RERA-approved projects, are eligible for home loans from all major banks and housing finance companies. Our team can connect you with trusted financial advisors who can help you navigate the home loan application process, calculate eligibility, and secure the best interest rates based on your financial profile and the specific 3BHK property you choose.

faqs.question: How can I schedule a site visit for the shortlisted 3BHK properties
faqs.answer: Scheduling a site visit is simple. You can use the 'Request a Callback' button on our page or contact our dedicated Sector 55 property consultant directly via phone or email. We will coordinate with the sellers or developers to arrange personal site visits at your convenience, ensuring you get a comprehensive tour of the property and the surrounding community environment.
